content: Hello everyone, I just came here, I just saw the cranelift example with the toy language, and I have not found any information regarding this question I have. How could I create "own data structures", or how could I, for example, add a "class" or "structure" to the JIT? And after a variable has that type of data, I apologize if the question does not make much sense but I am new to this and I would appreciate if someone guides me on this topic.
